channel.title: Error that disconnects everybody
channel.description:
error:
[code]Npc id =185 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at stream.createFrame(stream.java:153) at client.createGroundItem(client.java:12931) at ItemHandler.spawnItem(ItemHandler.java:103) at ItemHandler.addItem(ItemHandler.java:94) at NPCHandler.MonsterDropItem(NPCHandler.java:948) at NPCHandler.process(NPCHandler.java:796) at server.main(server.java:54)[/code]
It disconnects everybody.. Help.
Thanks
